text: Lateralus is the third album by American rock band Tool. It was released on May 15, 2001. The album came out at number one on the Billboard 200 music chart. It sold more than 500,000 copies in its first week. The RIAA gave it a double platinum certification in 2003. Tool won a Grammy Award for the song "Schism" in 2002. == Track listing == == References == Category:2001 albums Category:Tool (band) albums
title: Lateralus
